summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1865, for the improvement of Pasadena Place, form 45th Street to East 40th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks with all necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 19511 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
